%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.executionConditionalFormula: IF(  (  ISBLANK(customerInformation:name) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:msisdn) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:birthdate)  || ISBLANK(customerInformation:documentType) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:documentNumber) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:stateOrProvince) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:city) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:neighborhood) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:street1) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:street2) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:addressNumber) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:postCode)  ) ||  (  customerInformation:channel = "HYBRIS" && ( ISBLANK(customerInformation:contactAgreement) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:orderExternalId) ||  ISBLANK(customerInformation:cnl) || ISBLANK(customerInformation:ibge)||  ISBLANK(customerInformation:digitalAgreementIP) ||  ISBLANK(customerInformation:digitalAgreementDate))) || (customerInformation:channel = "URA" || customerInformation:channel = "SATPUSH" &&(ISBLANK(customerInformation:addressComplement))), true,false)
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.label: ResponseAction1
